name: Pie Crust
description: A versatile and flaky homemade pie crust, perfect for both sweet and savory pies. This all-butter recipe is simple to prepare and results in a rich, tender base for any filling.
keywords: pie crust, homemade pie crust, all-butter pie crust, flaky pie crust, pastry, pie dough, baking, dessert recipe, savory pie, sweet pie, American cuisine, baking from scratch, shortcrust pastry, quiche crust, tart crust, easy recipe, flour, butter, egg, chilled dough, versatile crust

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk together the flour and sugar.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix dry ingredients

recipeInstructions.text: Rub the butter into the flour mix until it resembled breadcrumbs.
recipeInstructions.name: Add butter

recipeInstructions.text: Thoroughly mix remaining ingredients together and then add it to the flour mixture. Work the mix together lightly with your hands until it resembles a dough. Do not knead. It will be sticky. If its a bit wet, add a bit more flour. If its a bit dry, add a bit more water.
recipeInstructions.name: Form dough

recipeInstructions.text: Cling film and refridgerate for at least an hour before use.
recipeInstructions.name: Refridgerate

notes: Makes 1 large crust including the top or 1 base with a bit extra.
Make sure the ingredients are well chilled, you do not want the butter melting while working the mix.
